title: Project Portfolio
text:
View Code 


 Offering three methods of strategy testing through live, historical, and simulated data, this full-stack system deploys and compares strategies while recording all trades and summary statistics‚Äìas they occur‚Äìvia trade logs. Available through a Dash UI, these python scripts converge together to conveniently display a PnL curve for each strategy, and a comparison PnL plot overlay of each curve as well.

title: Project Portfolio
text:
Geo-Spatial Latency Arbitrage

    View Code 


 Quantisphere is a Kubernetes-orchestrated, microservices-based platform that ingests high-frequency market data via Kafka, stores it in Parquet files (upgradable to kdb+) for ultra-low-latency time-series analytics, and seamlessly integrates Python-powered machine-learning models for real-time arbitrage signal generation. Its global latency map and WebSocket-driven dashboard provide sub-millisecond visibility into cross-exchange spreads, while Prometheus and Grafana ensure comprehensive observability, alerting, and performance monitoring at every stage of the data pipeline. Together, these components enable systematic identification and execution of latency arbitrage opportunities with enterprise-grade reliability and scalability.

title: Project Portfolio

title: Quant Dev Portfolio
text:
‚ÄúEngineering alpha through research-grade systematic infrastructure.‚Äù






Areas of Focus




Statistical Arbitrage (Equities, ETFs, Pairs)


Real-Time Market Manipulation Detection (Spoofing, Layering)


Latency Arbitrage Routing Optimization


Systematic Options Strategy Backtesting


Machine Learning for Signal Generation








Quick About Me


Quantitative developer and systems engineer with a background in mathematics, accounting, and financial engineering. I design institutional-grade infrastructure for real-time data collection, anomaly detection, and latency-optimized execution. Passionate about building high-performance research systems with measurable edge.






Systems in Action



LII-MSI Pair: Custom research infrastructure and data pipeline for evaluating laddered, multi-leg statistical arbitrage strategies.

title: About Me
text:
I‚Äôm a Statistical Arbitrage Quantitative Researcher focused on transforming advanced statistical and machine learning research into high-performance, production-grade trading strategies.
My expertise spans the entire quant lifecycle:

title: About Me
text:
üîç Areas of Expertise

Trading Strategies: Mean reversion, cross-sectional momentum, pricing inefficiencies

Alt Data & NLP: 10-Q parsing, earnings call tone analysis, SEC filings

ML Modeling: LSTMs, GARCH, Monte Carlo, ensemble methods

Infrastructure: Docker, Postgres, GitHub Actions, ClickHouse, Prometheus

My mission is to bridge quant theory with infrastructure engineering to deploy strategies that work in the real world.

title: MSDS Capstone
text:
Willamette University ¬∑ Master‚Äôs in Data Science
Project Goal: Real-time detection of spoofing and layering behavior using L2 order book data.




PostgreSQL + Parquet storage
Real-time WebSocket ingestion (IBKR/Alpaca)
XGBoost + Isolation Forest + Rule-based hybrid
LOB feature extraction pipeline (depth imbalance, pressure, cancellations)
Streamlit dashboard (dev) + Docker deployment

title: Quantisphere
text:
Quantisphere is a hedge-fund-grade systematic trading architecture built for real-time execution, PnL optimization, and latency-sensitive arbitrage.



Microsecond-level latency routing with Neo4j path switching
Real-time FIX gateway simulation
Grafana dashboards + Prometheus integration
Full Dockerized deployment with Prometheus alerts
ELK stack log aggregation
DRL-based strategy inference


üß† Built from scratch to mirror professional-grade HFT infrastructure.




Quantisphere Overview







Execution Engine: Python + C++ for low latency.
Data Ingestion: IBKR + Alpaca APIs with failover logic.
ML Inference: Deep RL trade selection engine.
Monitoring: Grafana/Prometheus with live metrics and Slack alerts.
Backtest Suite: Custom-built latency arbitrage replay framework.
